channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Family of father on run for years with three children in dense wilderness urges him to come home
The president has made a string of similar baffling slip-ups at the White House.
Officials issue warning about small pink blobs spreading across state: 'One of world's worst'

item.title: Hurricane Erin’s massive waves threaten to isolate North Carolina’s Outer Banks
WATCH: Skunk rescued after getting stuck in bowl at skatepark in Pennsylvania
item.description: A man used a skateboard attached to a dog leash to lift a skunk to safety after the critter got stuck inside a bowl at a Pennsylvania skatepark.

item.title: Oklahoma to test political leanings of teacher applicants from N.Y., Calif.
item.description: Oklahoma will require applicants for teacher jobs coming from California and New York to pass an exam the GOP-dominated state's top education official...

item.title: Hurricane Erin forces evacuations on North Carolina’s Outer Banks, threatens dangerous rip currents
item.description: Hurricane Erin is forcing evacuations on North Carolina’s Outer Banks as it threatens to whip up wild waves and tropical force winds.

item.title: Texas Democrat locked in state Capitol after refusing police escort
item.description: House leaders mandated police escorts for Democrats to guarantee they return for Wednesday's session.

item.title: Police escort Texas Democrats to prevent new redistricting walkout as California moves to retaliate

item.description: Attendance has fallen in some school systems since the crackdown began.

item.title: Texas House Democrats return to Austin as GOP redistricting push resumes
item.description: The Texas House gaveled in at noon with Democratic members present, marking an official end to the quorum break.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Zelenskyy says Trump meeting 'truly a significant step'
item.description: President Donald Trump was asked in the Oval Office about security guarantees for Ukraine and whether that will involve the U.S.
